text: The Kung Fu Panda franchise from DreamWorks Animation, consists of four movies: Kung Fu Panda (2008), Kung Fu Panda 2 (2011), Kung Fu Panda 3 (2016) and Kung Fu Panda 4 (2024). Two Annie Award-winning shorts, Secrets of the Furious Five (2008) and Kung Fu Panda Holiday (2010), were also released. A TV show for Nickelodeon called Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness premiered in the fall of 2011 and ended on June 29th 2016. ==Movies== * Kung Fu Panda (2008) * Kung Fu Panda 2 (2011) * Kung Fu Panda 3 (2016) * Kung Fu Panda 4 (2024) ==Television specials== * Kung Fu Panda Holiday (2010) ==TV Series== * Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (2011-2016) * Kung Fu Panda: The Paws of Destiny (2018-2019) * Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight (2022-2023) Category:Animation Category:Media franchises Category:Kung Fu Panda
title: Kung Fu Panda (franchise)
